name: MTLFunctionConstant
desc: A constant used to specialize the behavior of a shader.

items.name: var name: String
items.desc: The name of the function constant.

items.name: var type: MTLDataType
items.desc: The data type of the function constant.

items.name: var index: Int
items.desc: The index of the function constant.

items.name: var required: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the function constant must be provided to specialize the function.
